channel.description: Recent content in Naked Gun on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Original ‘Naked Gun’ Director Reacts to Reboot’s Opening Weekend (Exclusive)
item.description: David Zucker tells The Hollywood Reporter that he wants the best for the new film and reached out to director Akiva Schaffer to show his support, even if the movie “really isn’t what I would have done

item.title: Original ‘Naked Gun’ Director Reacts to Reboot’s Opening Weekend (Exclusive)
item.description: David Zucker tells The Hollywood Reporter that he wants the best for the new film and reached out to director Akiva Schaffer to show his support, even if the movie “really isn’t what I would have done

item.title: Box Office: ‘Fantastic Four’ Lords Over ‘Bad Guys 2,’ ‘Naked Gun’ But Suffers Sharp Decline
item.description: The Marvel superhero pic tumbled 66 percent in its sophomore outing domestically, compared to a 53 percent drop for DC’s ‘Superman,’ but is making up ground overseas.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Fantastic Four’ Lords Over ‘Bad Guys 2,’ ‘Naked Gun’ But Suffers Sharp Decline
item.description: The Marvel superhero pic tumbled 66 percent in its sophomore outing domestically, compared to a 53 percent drop for DC’s ‘Superman,’ but is making up ground overseas.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Naked Gun’ Makes $1.6 Million in Previews, ‘Bad Guys 2’ Has $2.25 Million
item.description: Paramount’s “The Naked Gun” reboot, one of the year’s funniest movies, has made $1.6 million at the box office so far after Thursday previews. It’s on track to make between $15 million and $17 m
